aspect_ratio.label: Keep Image Aspect Ratio
aspect_ratio.comment: Set "Yes", to keep aspect ratio of the product images (height of the images will be calculated Image aspect ratio size).

custom_aspect_ratio_size.label: Or custom aspect ratio size
custom_aspect_ratio_size.comment: To calculate this value you need to div the height of your image to the width.

alt_image.label: Alternative Image
alt_image.comment: Show alternative image on mouse hover over the main image.

alt_image_column.label: Select Alt. Image By Column
alt_image_column.comment: Which column of the product image gallery will mark alternative images of your products.

alt_image_column_value.label: Alt. Image Column Value
alt_image_column_value.comment: Specify the value which will mark alternative images of your products. E.g.: if Select Alt. Image By Column is set to "Sort Order", specify the number which will mark (in "Sort Order" column of the product image gallery) alternative images, for example: "2".

image_width.label: Image Width
image_width.comment: Set width image in page products list.

image_height.label: Image Height
image_height.comment: Set height image in page products list.

column_count.label: Number of Columns
column_count.comment: Number of products displayed in a single row.

column_count_768.label: Number of Columns Below 768px
column_count_768.comment: Number of columns displayed if browser viewport width is between 640 px and 768 px.

column_count_640.label: Number of Columns Below 640px
column_count_640.comment: Number of columns displayed if browser viewport width is between 480px and 640 px.

column_count_480.label: Number of Columns Below 480px
column_count_480.comment: Number of columns displayed if browser viewport width is between 320 px and 480 px. Below that width products are displayed in a single column.

equal_height.label: Equal Height of Grid Items (Products)
equal_height.comment: If enabled, all grid items have the same height and "Add to cart" button is displayed at the bottom edge of the item.

hover_effect.label: Product Hover Effect
hover_effect.comment: Effect is visible on mouse hover over the product. Important: enable in order to use "Display On Hover" in Display Selected Elements.

display_addtolinks.label: "Add to" Links
display_addtolinks.comment: "Add to wishlist" and "Add to compare" links.

addtolinks_simple.label: Show "Add to" Links as Icons Above the Image
addtolinks_simple.comment: If set to "No", "Add to wishlist" and "Add to compare" links will be displayed as text links.

hover_effect.label: Product Hover Effect
hover_effect.comment: Effect is visible on mouse hover over the product.

addtolinks_simple.label: Show "Add to" Links as Simple Icons
addtolinks_simple.comment: If set to "No", "Add to wishlist" and "Add to compare" links will be displayed as text links with icons.

zoom_enable.label: Enable Cloud Zoom
zoom_enable.comment: Enable Cloud Zoom in Product Detail Page

zoom_width.label: Zoom Width
zoom_width.comment: The width of the zoom window in pixels. If it is missing, the width will be the same as the small image

zoom_height.label: Zoom Height
zoom_height.comment: The height of the zoom window in pixels. If it is missing, the height will be the same as the small image

zoom_position.label: Zoom Position
zoom_position.comment: Specifies the position of the zoom window relative to the small image

zoom_count.label: More Views Count
zoom_count.comment: Number of images show on More Views (replace by FlexSlider)

replace_upsell.label: Up-sell Products
replace_upsell.comment: To replace Up-sell Products first enable static block with ID block_product_replace_upsell

replace_related.label: Related Products
replace_related.comment: To replace Related Products first enable static block with ID block_product_replace_related

magento_blocks.label: Default Magento Blocks
magento_blocks.comment: In this section you can disable default Magento blocks.

top_links.label: Top Links
top_links.comment: Links in the header: Accoun, Wishlist, Log In etc.

custom_css.label: Load Custom CSS
custom_css.comment: Enable this option to load "custom.css" file in which you can override the default styling of the theme. To create "custom.css" you can use the file "SAMPLE.custom.css" which is located in skin/frontend/puro/default/css directory.

button_active_bg_color.label: Button Active Background Color
button_active_bg_color.comment: Selected emphasized buttons, e.g. "Add to cart" on product page, "Proceed to checkout" etc.

button_active_color.label: Button Active Text Color
button_active_color.comment: Selected emphasized buttons, e.g. "Add to cart" on product page, "Proceed to checkout" etc.

font_size.label: Basic Font Size
font_size.comment: Size of the regular text. Font size of most of the other elements will be calculated relative to this value.

primary_font_family_group.label: Headings Font Family
primary_font_family_group.comment: Select predefined font stack, Google Fonts or type in your custom font stack.

primary_font_family_custom.label: Custom
primary_font_family_custom.comment:
Type in your custom font stack, e.g.:
Arial, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, sans-serif Important: Do not add trailing semicolon.

primary_font_family.label: Headings Font Family - Google Fonts
primary_font_family.comment: Font preview is available on Google Web Fonts

primary_char_latin_ext.label: Character Set: Latin Extended
primary_char_latin_ext.comment: Only selected fonts support extended character sets. For a complete list of available fonts and font subsets please refer to Google Web Fonts.

stretched.label: Stretched
stretched.comment: If set to "Yes", main menu will have the same width as the main content area.

border.label: Show Top/Bottom Border
border.comment: Border has the same color as Active Background Color.

main.label: Main
main.comment: In this tab, you can configure the main section of the page (the section located between the header and the footer).

footer.label: Footer
footer.comment: In this tab, you can configure the entire footer of the page. Settings from this tab are inherited by all the other sub-sections of the footer. Some of the settings can be overridden in sub-sections.
